MCQ: What term was coined in 1959 by Arthur Samuel?
Choices: a:Artificial intelligence | b:Machine learning | c:Computer gaming | d:Self-teaching computers

MCQ: Who introduced a theoretical neural structure in 1949?
Choices: a:Donald Hebb | b:Arthur Samuel | c:Walter Pitts | d:Warren McCulloch

MCQ: What was the purpose of Cybertron, developed in the 1960s?

MCQ: According to Tom M. Mitchell, what defines machine learning?
